# init(label:amount:type:)

**Initializer**

Initializes and returns a summary item with the given label, amount, and type.

## Declaration

```swift
convenience init(label: String, amount: NSDecimalNumber, type: PKPaymentSummaryItemType)
```

## Parameters

- **label**: A short, localized description of the summary item.
- **amount**: The amount associated with the summary item.
- **type**: The type of the summary item.

## Return Value

A summary item with the given label, amount, and type.

## Discussion

When creating summary items for estimates or charges whose final value isn’t yet known, use a [doc://com.apple.passkit/documentation/PassKit/PKPaymentSummaryItemType/pending] type. Use [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Foundation/NSDecimalNumber/zero] for the amount of pending items. The payment sheet doesn’t show the value of pending items.
